short_summary: Supply and delivery of Campus Vehicles
description: A Standing Order for Campus Vehicles that includes Electric Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles. The Standing Order will have a term of one (1) firm year and four (4) optional years. This is a general Supplies and Services contract that has been set aside for Indigenous Businesses.
full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer for Campus Vehicles**

**Notice Type**
 Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)

**Contracting Authority**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Description of Requirement**
The Government of Canada has a requirement to establish a National Master Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of Campus Vehicles, which includes Electric Golf Carts and Low Speed Vehicles (LSV). This Standing Offer will have a term of one (1) firm year and four (4) optional years, with the option to deliver vehicles to locations across Canada.

**Tender Information**

* **Tender Closing Date**: February 7, 2023, at 14:00 HAE
* **Publication Date**: January 18, 2023
* **Tender Description**: Public Services and Procurement Canada is seeking bids for the supply and delivery of Campus Vehicles.
* **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to applicable trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Contract Requirements**
The contract will be awarded on the basis of Lowest Price. The contractor must deliver the vehicles to the required locations across Canada.

**Bidding Requirements**
Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the Government of Canada's electronic tendering system, Buyandsell. The bid submission must include all required supporting documentation and be received by the tender closing date and time.

**Post Tender Information**
The Government of Canada reserves the right to request debriefing from the bidder on the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Contact Information**

* Please submit your questions or request for debriefing to the Contracting Authority: [Contact information will be added once the procurement is fully active](inthisprocurement)

* For any additional information or clarification regarding this tender notice, please contact [ purchasing officer] at [ purchasing officer email address ]

This is a newbie friendly RFSA for a Masters Standing Offer. An interested Contractor can register and fill the RFX ID http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15163818?extsite=MTUxNjM4MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== and follow this procurement to learn more about this RFSA
